sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Report administration

The Reports list displays all the reports in your instance. Click a report title to view the properties of the report, filter the report, and to edit the roles the report is available to.

Click the column headers to search, sort, filter, and edit data.

The Reports list has the following columns:
  • Title – The name of the report.
  • Table – The table on which the report is based.
  • Type – The type of report.
  • Field Name – The value of the report's Group by field, if it has one.
  • User – Contains the sharing settings. If this field contains an ID, then the report is only visible to the user with that ID.
    • Global indicates that the report is visible to all users.
    • Group indicates that the report is visible only to users within specified groups.
    • User indicates that the report is visible to one or more specific users.
  • Updated – The date and time the report was last modified.

Click the report title to view the report configuration.

Related information
Report types and creation details
sys_embedded_help_content.name: sys_report_list-normal
